title: Looking for Cincinnati...Old Judge, Gypsy Queen & Mayo Cut Plug All Players
author: timkb

posts.post_title: Looking for Cincinnati...Old Judge, Gypsy Queen & Mayo Cut Plug All Players
posts.post_content:
I am a pre wwii Cincinnati collector! Will consider reasonable prices on many cards and memorabilia.

Most interested in pieces that include hand writing, historic refferences, and other period specific markings.

Don't get me wrong - still lover a gem mint 10, but I have a place in my heart for the historic pieces.

Tim--I can help eliminate a lot of cards from your list--there are no Cincinnati   Gypsy Queens. Gypsy Queens only cover 1887 NL teams plus Brooklyn and St Louis.

Good Luck---Jay

$225 (net to me) shipped
back has writing "this man not far from the kettle".

Rob
:)
[url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]
